name: The Whole Proof
tag_list: proofreading, copyediting, esl, authors, students, businesses, proofread-service, better-english, essays, cvs, theses
overview:
The Whole Proof is an international internet-based business providing English proofreading and copy-editing services to a global base.

The Whole Proof helps its clients say what they want to say with clarity, fluency and lucidity, while retaining their unique voice. Proofreading and copy-editing are the only way to ensure that work is truly error free, allowing clients peace of mind as their documents go to the printer or publisher, knowing that there will not be any unpleasant, expensive mistakes in the final product.
